title: Man arrested in Kotte for KG possession
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Special task Force (STF) arrested a man in possession of Kerala Ganja, from Ethul Kotte.
A 24-year-old resident of Angoda was arrested for possession of 2kg 218g of Kerala Ganja near a Supermarket in Ethul Kotte.
CA orders Lands Commissioner NOT to follow circular on ‘Other State Forests’
